text: 4.10 Ais 12.3, Jer 2.13, Sek 13.1, 14.8, Jon 4.26 Anɨb agek, Jisas pen nop agak, Tap teplep God binɨb okok kɨlop ñɨnɨmuŋ ak, nad ma nepan agak. Pen yad nep ñɨg mal ñe ñɨŋin agebin ak, yɨp abe ma nepan agak. Anɨb okok nepan tek, yɨp pen agnɨgebɨnap, ñɨg ñɨbɨl pelpel yenɨgabal ak nep ñɨbɨnep agak.
